QuestData.Title: Fallen to Their Vices
QuestData.Description:
Lysonia's forces ransack our sacred temple... they are long gone from the Archon's embrace.
It pains me to say, but you must defeat them so they can no longer abuse our people.
Take Compassion with you. You will find it more than helpful, now that its power has returned.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat $1oa Forsworn forces in the Terrace of Inner Grace.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Kleia at the Terrace of Inner Grace.
